values: 高级的；资深的；年长的；年纪较大的；地位较高的；职位较高的；大学最后一年的；（学校中）年级较高的；（与某人比）年龄较大的；（父子同名时；加在父亲的名字前）老；大
毕业班学生；高水平运动员；级别（或地位）较高者；较…年长的人；资深成人运动员；上级；中学生；上司

synonym.mean: 高级的；年长的；地位较高的；年资较深的，资格较老的
上司；较年长者；毕业班学生

sample.mean: n. 政府立法机关；参议院；古罗马共和国（及罗马帝国）的元老院；理事会；参议会
adj. 较高的；上级的；高质的；在上的；在其他器官之上的；优质的；傲慢的；高标准的；自大的；占优势的

pos_mean_info_list.mean: 长辈；老资格；前任者的特权

word_group.brief_definition: 高阶管理人员；资深管理；高级管理层
高级主管；高级执行官；高管
高中生；高年级学生；大四学生
资深的同事；年长的同事
高级工作人员；资深工作人员；高级员工
高中；高级中学；高中教育

bilingual.source: Q : What is a specialist or senior level role within a company?
bilingual.target: 2Q: 在一家公司内的一个专家或高级的水平角色是什么?

bilingual.source: "The bomber targeted a police recruiting center, " senior police official said.
bilingual.target: 一个高级的警察官员说：“轰炸者原来的目标是警察署中心。”

bilingual.source: The decision to issue an ex-gratia payment will be made at a senior operational level.
bilingual.target: 发出付款的决定将被高级的处理人员作出。

bilingual.source: It can be simple and non-skilled users to install, and also provided the senior management options.
bilingual.target: 它可以被非熟练用户简单地设置，并且还提供了高级的管理选项。

bilingual.source: Because he's the senior water-rights holder, he can protect the water from other users in the stream. OK?
bilingual.target: 因为他是高级的水资源权利拥有者，他能保护水源免受溪流的其他使用者的伤害。对么？

bilingual.source: Science is a kind of senior civilized which is sublimed from the substance and spirit worlds created by science and technology.
bilingual.target: 科学是在通过技术所开创的物质与精神世界中升华成的一种高级的文明形式。

bilingual.source: And one of the Vatican's most senior figures Cardinal Pell has appeared in court in Australia to face charges of historical sex abuse.
bilingual.target: 梵蒂冈最高级的人物之一主教佩尔在澳大利亚出庭，面临有性虐待史的指控。

bilingual.source: It's a combination of public company pressures on short-term goals, and senior level luddites not wanting to risk their fat cat salaries.
bilingual.target: 这始于公众公司短期目标的压力和高级的卢德派不愿意赌上他们不菲的收入这两个因素的结合。

bilingual.source: Belief reception, as a senior reception way, is the inevitable result of the development of compliance reception and identification reception.
bilingual.target: 信仰性接受作为一种高级的接受方式，是顺从性接受和认同性接受发展的必然结果。

bilingual.source: The UK's most senior counter terror officer has said that the threat from the extreme far-right is growing and that four attack plots were foiled last year.
bilingual.target: 英国最高级的反恐官员称极右派主义的威胁在逐渐增加，并表示去年有四次密谋袭击行动被成功阻止。

yingyinNormal.en: Isn't it today Senior Ditch Day?
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天不是高四逃课日吗？

yingyinNormal.en: This is your senior year, also known as your last year to not suck.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你今年读高三，也是你能不当废柴的最后一年了。

yingyinNormal.en: Okay. Senior year of college, on a pool table. Pool table? That's my sister.
yingyinNormal.zh: 大四在桌球台上。桌球台上？这就是我妹啦。

yingyinNormal.en: Just so you know I was a freshman and she was a senior. So it wasn't as bad as…
yingyinNormal.zh: 其实我是大一，她是高三，所以没那么…

yingyinNormal.en: So you wanna assist an old person. Yeah. Then I'll be a senior wilderness explorer.
yingyinNormal.zh: 你是想要帮助老人家咯。是啊，那我就会成为高级荒野探险家。

yingyinNormal.en: By receiving their badges, the following explorers will graduate to Senior Explorers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 现在颁发徽章，以下探险者将升级为高级探险者。

yingyinNormal.en: If I get it, I'll become a senior wilderness explorer. The wilderness must be explored.
yingyinNormal.zh: 如果我得到了，我就是高级荒野探险家，大自然在召唤着我们。

yingyinNormal.en: After my senior year, I was just dying to play in college, And I felt like I deserved it.
yingyinNormal.zh: 高中毕业时，我非常想在大学打篮球，而且觉得自己有这个实力

yingyinNormal.en: I won't say that all senior citizens who can't master technology should be publicly flogged.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我不能说所有无法掌握当代技术的老年人就应该被当众鞭策一番。

yingyinNormal.en: That's the saddest thing I've ever heard. You think? Go ahead, tell her about your senior prom.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我听过的最可怜的事了。是吗？继续，告诉她你高中毕业舞会的事。

yingyinNormal.en: Today's Ditch Day? No way you are ditching Ditch Day. It's like the best week of senior year, day.
yingyinNormal.zh: 今天是逃课日吗？逃课日你绝对不能错过。简直是高四最棒的一周，一天。

yingyinNormal.en: We dated for a little while. I was a sophomore, and he was a senior. It's fine. No, it's not fine.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我们交往一阵子了。当时我高一，他高三，所以没问题。问题可大了。

yingyinNormal.en: Manny's first girlfriend is a senior with a Mustang. I'd have put my money on a sophomore with a mustache.
yingyinNormal.zh: 曼尼的初恋女友是个开野马的高三女生。我还想赌是个有小胡子的大二生呢。

yingyinNormal.en: Senior theoretical particle physicist at CalTech, focusing on M theory, or, in layman's terms, string theory.
yingyinNormal.zh: 加州理工学院的高级理论粒子物理学家，主要致力于M理论研究，外行人说法是弦理论。

yingyinNormal.en: Can you get me access to this man here? Browning. Fischer Senior's righthand man. Fischer Junior's godfather.
yingyinNormal.zh: 有办法帮我接近布宁吗？费舍尔爸爸的得力助手，也是费舍尔的教父。

yingyinNormal.en: I think that covers everybody. so let's give a big explorer call to our brand new Senior Wilderness Explorers.
yingyinNormal.zh: 徽章已经颁发完毕，让我们给这群新的高级探险者热烈的掌声。

yingyinNormal.en: I'm Senior Vice President at Stratton Oakmont and I plan on being one of the top brokers in my firm next year.
yingyinNormal.zh: 我是斯奥投资的高级副总裁，我的目标是在明年成为我公司顶级经纪人之一。

yingyinNormal.en: Who's the Senior Congressman from Hawaii? Chair of Appropriations. I know him, I'm just drawing a blank right now.
yingyinNormal.zh: 夏威夷的资深参议员是谁？拨款委员会主席，我认识他，我只是一时想不起来。

yingyinNormal.en: This is the first time we're hiring senior interns, so some of our intern questions may not exactly fit your profile.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是我们第一次聘用老年实习生，所以我们面试的问题可能有些不符合你的简历。

yingyinNormal.en: This is what the average senior citizen gets, one year from entitlements, whether they were a janitor or they ran a hedge fund.
yingyinNormal.zh: 这是国民一年平均从福利项目得到的数额，不管是清洁工，还是对冲基金经理。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2012-2023年12年间全国考研试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2012-2023年全国考研英语一和考研英语二共24套考研试卷，包括阅读、完型填空、翻译、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选全国考研考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2012-2023年12年间全国考研英语一和考研英语二试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 高阶管理人员；资深管理；高级管理层

sense_info_list.en: higher in rank or status than others

examination_example.sentence: Your <highlight>senior</highlight> colleague outlines a project timeline you believe is unrealistic.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 你的上司概述了你认为不现实的项目时间表。

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Senior</highlight> management is family-friendly.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 高级管理层对家庭友好。

examination_example.sentence: In particular, the corporate workplace will never be completely family-friendly until women are part of <highlight>senior</highlight> management decisions, and Europe's top corporate-governance positions remain overwhelmingly male.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 企业的职场尤其如此，如果女性不参与高层决策，企业职场将永远不会彻底地为家庭着想，但是绝大多数的欧洲顶级企业管理职位仍然是被男性所占据。

sense_info_list.en: for senior citizens(= older people, especially those who have retired from work)

examination_example.sentence: <highlight>Seniors</highlight> are living longer, but planning for the extended years is key.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 老年人的寿命越来越长，但为延长的岁月做计划才是关键。

examination_example.sentence: As the brain fades, we refer to these occurrences as "<highlight>senior</highlight> moments."
examination_example.sentence_trans: 随着大脑不断衰退，我们把这些事情称作是“短暂失忆”。

sense_info_list.en: connected with the last year in high school or college

examination_example.sentence: One survey from Accenture found that 88 percent of graduating <highlight>seniors</highlight> this year chose their major with a job in mind.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 埃森哲的一项调查发现，今年88%的毕业生选择专业时考虑到了工作。

sample.mean: n. 政府立法机关；参议院；古罗马共和国（及罗马帝国）的元老院；理事会；参议会
adj. 较高的；上级的；高质的；在上的；在其他器官之上的；优质的；傲慢的；高标准的；自大的；占优势的

word_usage.usage: 在表示“比……年长；比……职位高”时，senior通常与介词to连用，如：He is senior to me. 他的职位比我高。

exam_freq_info.chinese: 成人的; 高级水平的

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间全六级试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: for senior citizens(= older people, especially those who have retired from work)

examination_example.sentence: To be fair, if Rodriguez had wanted feedback from some more technophobic (害怕技术的) <highlight>seniors</highlight>, he might have ended up in the wrong Brookdale community.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 公平地说，如果Rodriguez 希望得到更多恐惧技术的长者的反馈，那么他可能以错误的选择了 Brookdale 社区结束。

sense_info_list.en: higher in rank or status than others

examination_example.sentence: Rodriguez is just the seventh entrepreneur to move into one of Brookdale's 1, 100 <highlight>senior</highlight> living communities.
examination_example.sentence_trans: Rodriguez 仅是第七位进入 Brookdale 1,100个高级居住社区之一的企业家。

examination_example.sentence: It also plans to offer "voluntary separation" packages to 165 <highlight>senior</highlight> executives.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 它还计划向165位高管提供“自愿离职”补偿金。

sense_info_list.en: for adults or people at a more advanced level
sense_info_list.zh: 成人的; 高级水平的

sense_info_list.en: connected with the last year in high school or college

sample.mean: n. 政府立法机关；参议院；古罗马共和国（及罗马帝国）的元老院；理事会；参议会
adj. 较高的；上级的；高质的；在上的；在其他器官之上的；优质的；傲慢的；高标准的；自大的；占优势的

exam_freq_info.chinese: 高三/高四学生; 大四学生; 毕业年级的

word_level_phrase_info.brief_definition: 高中生；高年级学生；大四学生

direction_info.description:
数据源自2016.6-2023.6年8年间全四级试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight>考纲释义</highlight>
精选实考、考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2016-2023年51套试卷，包括阅读、听力、翻译等所有题型。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2016-2023年8年间试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: for senior citizens(= older people; especially those who have retired from work)

examination_example.sentence: He did not go to university and at age 18 married Anne Hathaway, who was eight years his <highlight>senior</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 他没有上过大学，18岁时娶了比他大八岁的安妮·海瑟薇。

sense_info_list.en: connected with the last year in high school or college
sense_info_list.zh: 高三/高四学生; 大四学生; 毕业年级的

examination_example.sentence: It was just a month ago that East Juniata High School <highlight>seniors</highlight> met in the school's auditorium for graduation.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 就在一个月前，东朱尼亚塔高中的高年级学生在学校礼堂举行了毕业典礼。

examination_example.sentence: From the last three graduating classes, 16 <highlight>seniors</highlight> were admitted to MIT.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在刚刚毕业的三个班级中，有16名毕业班学生被麻省理工学院录取。

examination_example.sentence: It poses a challenge to <highlight>seniors</highlight>.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 这对大四学生来说是个挑战。

sense_info_list.en: higher in rank or status than others

examination_example.sentence: In 1980, about 60 percent of <highlight>senior</highlight> high school students said they read a book, newspaper or magazine every day.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 1980年，大约60%的高中生说他们每天读一本书、报纸或杂志。

examination_example.sentence: My father is a successful <highlight>senior</highlight> executive.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我父亲是一位成功的高级管理人员。

examination_example.sentence: At <highlight>senior</highlight> levels, only a quarter of professors are women, and black women make up less than 2 % of all female academic staff.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 在高级职位上，只有四分之一的教授是女性，黑人女性在所有女性学术人员中所占比例不到2%。

sample.mean: n. 政府立法机关；参议院；古罗马共和国（及罗马帝国）的元老院；理事会；参议会
adj. 较高的；上级的；高质的；在上的；在其他器官之上的；优质的；傲慢的；高标准的；自大的；占优势的

word_usage.usage:
senior常作表语，与to连用，或用于姓名后，用于父子兄弟同名时，指年长者，略作Sr.。如：
It was Bush Jr. not Bush Sr. who was elected the president of the USA in 2000.
在2000年是小布什而不是老布什被选为总统。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2015-2022年全国卷高考试卷，包括阅读、完形、单选、填空、听力、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2015-2022年8年间全国卷和自主命题省市高考卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

sense_info_list.en: higher in rank or status than others

examination_example.sentence: Well, let me see…after lunch, I have to attend a <highlight>senior</highlight> staff meeting, which may last about two hours.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 嗯，让我想想……午饭后，我要参加一个高级职员会议，可能要开两个小时左右。

examination_example.sentence: Many experts have given talks here that have focused on the medical care and the development of public services for <highlight>senior</highlight> citizens.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 许多专家在这里发表了演讲，演讲的重点是老年人的医疗保健和公共服务的发展。

sample.mean: n. 政府立法机关；参议院；古罗马共和国（及罗马帝国）的元老院；理事会；参议会
adj. 较高的；上级的；高质的；在上的；在其他器官之上的；优质的；傲慢的；高标准的；自大的；占优势的

word_usage.usage:
senior常作表语，与to连用，或用于姓名后，用于父子兄弟同名时，指年长者，略作Sr.。如：
It was Bush Jr. not Bush Sr. who was elected the president of the USA in 2000.
在2000年是小布什而不是老布什被选为总统。

direction_info.description:
数据源自2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗翻译进行大数据分析汇总，数据仅供参考。

<highlight> 考频分布</highlight>
由搜狗翻译收集历年真题试卷、汇总单词出现的总频次、释义分布。题型选自2018-2021年全国重点省市中考试卷，包括听力、阅读、完形、单选、填空、改错、写作等所有题型。

<highlight> 考纲释义</highlight>
精选各省市考纲词汇、单词义项，由搜狗大数据与考纲、历年真题进行匹配。

<highlight>真题例句</highlight>
精选2018-2021年4年间全国各省市中考试卷，由搜狗大数据与搜索内容匹配历年真题例句。

搜狗翻译拥有最终解释权。

examination_example.sentence: I came up with a way to help lonely <highlight>seniors</highlight> with my friends.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我想出了一个方法和我的朋友们一起来帮助孤独的老年人。

examination_example.sentence: Can <highlight>seniors</highlight> in Western countries take the trains for free?
examination_example.sentence_trans: 西方国家的老年人可以免费乘坐火车吗？

examination_example.sentence: But Western <highlight>seniors</highlight> don’t often live with their children—they live alone.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 但是西方的老年人不经常和他们的孩子住在一起——他们独自生活。

examination_example.sentence: Only in this way can I learn English well in <highlight>senior</highlight> high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 只有这样，我才能在高中学好英语。

examination_example.sentence: This year in August, I’m starting <highlight>senior</highlight> high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 今年八月，我就要开始读高中了。

examination_example.sentence: I am looking forward to the new life of <highlight>senior</highlight> high school.
examination_example.sentence_trans: 我期待着高中的新生活。

examination_example.sentence: "It is 5G that is going to be a huge jump forward for communication systems " said <highlight>senior</highlight> director．
examination_example.sentence_trans: “对通信系统来说，5G将是一个巨大的飞跃”高级主管说。

sample.mean: n. 政府立法机关；参议院；古罗马共和国（及罗马帝国）的元老院；理事会；参议会
adj. 较高的；上级的；高质的；在上的；在其他器官之上的；优质的；傲慢的；高标准的；自大的；占优势的
